sliders.ui_description: Gestiona el ruido y la pureza de la imagen sin perder la textura orgánica del sensor.

levels.OFF: PRESERVE PATINA. Treat sensor noise and grain as essential texture. Do not denoise. Maintain organic "film" feel.
levels.LOW: CHROMA DENOISE. Remove only color noise (purple/green blotches). Keep Luminance grain to prevent waxy skin.
levels.MED: SIGNAL POLISH. Standard ISO reduction. Clean smooth surfaces (walls, sky) but protect high-frequency texture areas.
levels.HIGH: COMMERCIAL CLEANUP. High-end editorial denoising. Remove all dust spots and sensor dirt. Smooth gradients.
levels.FORCE: PRISTINE SIGNAL PROCESSING. HIGH-END FREQUENCY SEPARATION CLEANUP. ZERO ARTIFACTS. PERFECT SENSOR READOUT.

sliders.ui_description: Corrige la distorsión de la lente y la perspectiva como una cámara técnica.

levels.OFF: OPTICAL LOCK. Preserve original lens character (including barrel/pincushion distortion). Do not crop.
levels.LOW: LENS PROFILE FIX. Correct vignetting (dark corners) and chromatic aberration (color fringing). Keep perspective.
levels.MED: PERSPECTIVE ALIGN. Straighten horizon line. Fix minor vertical keystoning. Center the subject visually.
levels.HIGH: RECTILINEAR MODE. Remove all lens distortion. Straighten architectural lines. Re-compose edges.
levels.FORCE: TECHNICAL CAMERA PRECISION. ZERO DISTORTION. TILT-SHIFT LENS ALIGNMENT. PERFECT GRID. FLATTEN FACIAL DISTORTION.

sliders.ui_description: Simula la calidad del cristal de la lente (Acutancia y Micro-contraste).

levels.OFF: VINTAGE OPTICS. Maintain lens softness, spherical aberration, and "dreamy" lack of contrast. Preserve bloom.
levels.LOW: KIT LENS SHARP. Remove diffraction softness. Apply subtle Unsharp Mask (Radius 0.5px) to define edges.
levels.MED: PRO ZOOM (24-70mm). High micro-contrast. Clear texture separation. Modern lens coating look (no glare).
levels.HIGH: PRIME LENS (85mm). Razor sharp eyelashes and iris texture. High Acutance. Zero chromatic aberration.
levels.FORCE: MASTER LENS SIMULATION (ZEISS/LEICA). DIFFRACTION-LIMITED SHARPNESS. MAXIMUM MTF CURVE PERFORMANCE. CRYSTALLINE CLARITY.

sliders.ui_description: Elimina trepidación y movimiento simulando velocidades de obturación altas.

levels.OFF: NATURAL DRAG. Preserve motion blur in moving objects to convey speed/action. Cinematic shutter (1/50s).
levels.LOW: STABILIZATION (IS). Remove handheld camera shake (trepidation). Keep motion blur only on very fast objects.
levels.MED: ACTION FREEZE. Sport mode shutter (1/500s). Freeze walking/talking subjects. Sharp edges on moving parts.
levels.HIGH: HIGH SPEED SYNC. Freeze splashes and hair movement. 1/2000s shutter simulation. Crisp frozen details.
levels.FORCE: 1/8000s SHUTTER SPEED. FROZEN MOTION. ZERO TREPIDATION. STROBOSCOPIC CLARITY. PERFECTLY FROZEN PARTICLES.

sliders.ui_description: Recupera información de luces y sombras (Revelado Digital).

levels.OFF: ORIGINAL EXPOSURE. Keep crushed blacks (Zone 0) and blown highlights (Zone 10) as mood/style choice.
levels.LOW: HISTOGRAM SAFE. Stretch contrast to ensure data exists in shadows. Fix "grey" blacks. Normalized exposure.
levels.MED: SHADOW RECOVERY. Lift Zone 2-3 details. Soften highlight clipping. Balanced "Commercial" exposure.
levels.HIGH: HDR TONE MAP. Compress dynamic range for maximum visibility. Reveal details in dark corners and bright windows.
levels.FORCE: 16-BIT TIFF DYNAMIC RANGE. FULL HISTOGRAM RECOVERY. ANSEL ADAMS ZONE SYSTEM OPTIMIZATION. NO CLIPPING.

sliders.ui_description: Recupera detalle de alta frecuencia (poros, hilos) realista.

levels.OFF: SOFT FOCUS. Maintain low-frequency details only. Smooth/plastic look is acceptable if source dictates.
levels.LOW: TEXTURE ENHANCE. Sharpen existing surface details (fabric, skin) without adding new information.
levels.MED: DETAIL RESTORE. Reconstruct lost texture in slightly blurry areas. Recover fabric weave definition.
levels.HIGH: HIGH-FREQ SYNTHESIS. Generate missing pores and fine lines based on context. 4K texture density.
levels.FORCE: MACRO-FIDELITY RESTORATION. ORGANIC HIGH-FREQUENCY DETAIL. TACTILE SURFACE REALISM. 100MP SENSOR DETAIL.

sliders.ui_description: Añade estructura de grano orgánico para realismo analógico.

levels.OFF: DIGITAL CLEAN. Modern sensor look. Zero grain. Clinical perfection.
levels.LOW: ISO 100 GRAIN. Very fine, almost invisible structure. Adds subtle cohesion to digital pixels.
levels.MED: KODAK PORTRA 400. Distinct organic grain structure. Pleasing texture. Warm analog feel.
levels.HIGH: ILFORD HP5 (1600). Heavy, gritty grain. Documentary aesthetic. High texture perceptibility.
levels.FORCE: CINEMA FILM STOCK EMULSION. ORGANIC GRAIN STRUCTURE. ANALOG AESTHETIC INTEGRATION. NO DIGITAL NOISE.

sliders.ui_description: Controla el diafragma (f-stop) y el desenfoque del fondo.

levels.OFF: HYPERFOCAL (f/16). EVERYTHING IN FOCUS. From foreground to infinity. Maximum context visibility. Landscape standard.
levels.LOW: COMMERCIAL (f/8). DEEP DEPTH OF FIELD. Subject clearly sharp, background distinct but slightly softer. Group photo standard.
levels.MED: ENVIRONMENTAL (f/4). NATURAL SEPARATION. Subject pops, background is blurry but recognizable (Contextual).
levels.HIGH: PORTRAIT (f/1.8). CREAMY BOKEH. Background is washed out. Strong subject separation. Soft highlight circles.
levels.FORCE: NOCTILUX DREAM (f/0.95). EXTREME BOKEH. RAZOR-THIN FOCAL PLANE. BACKGROUND OBLITERATED INTO CREAMY AESTHETIC.

sliders.ui_description: Aumenta la resolución simulando sensores de formato medio.

levels.OFF: NATIVE RES. Keep original pixel count. Upscale via simple bicubic if needed.
levels.LOW: SMART UPSCALE (2x). Maintain edge integrity. Smooth out jaggies/pixelation.
levels.MED: SUPER-RES (4x). AI-based detail refinement. Density suitable for 4K displays.
levels.HIGH: PRINT DENSITY. 300 DPI simulation. Fine detail robustness for large format printing.
levels.FORCE: PHASE ONE IQ4 QUALITY. 150MP SENSOR SIMULATION. PRINT-READY DENSITY. REMOVE PIXEL GRID.

sliders.ui_description: Retoque de piel tipo editorial (mantiene poros, quita manchas).

levels.OFF: BIOMETRIC LOCK. Preserve all acne, scars, redness, and oil. Documentary skin reality.
levels.LOW: HEALTHY GLOW. Remove temporary redness/blotchiness. Even out skin tone. Keep moles/freckles.
levels.MED: STUDIO MATTE. Commercial retouch. Soften pores. Remove shine/oil. Brighten under-eyes.
levels.HIGH: HIGH-END EDITORIAL. Frequency Separation. Flawless texture. Defined features. Porcelain finish.
levels.FORCE: HIGH-END RETOUCHING. FLAWLESS COMPLEXION. RETAIN NATURAL PORES & VELLUS HAIR. EVEN SKIN TONE. VOGUE COVER STANDARD.

sliders.ui_description: Define el cabello y volumen con acabado de salón.

levels.OFF: NATURAL MESS. Keep flyaways, frizz, and messy hairline. Authentic "bed head".
levels.LOW: FRIZZ CONTROL. Smooth out humidity frizz. Tame stray hairs. Healthy shine.
levels.MED: SALON BLOWOUT. Defined volume. Clean hairline. Product-styled finish.
levels.HIGH: LIQUID HAIR. High gloss. Perfect strand definition. Keratin treatment look.
levels.FORCE: SESSION STYLIST FINISH. HEALTHY CUTICLE SHINE. CONTROLLED VOLUME. DEFINED STRANDS. NO FLYAWAYS.

sliders.ui_description: Mejora la caída y calidad de los tejidos.

levels.OFF: FABRIC LOCK. Keep wrinkles, stains, lint, and wear. Authentic clothing state.
levels.LOW: STEAM IRON. Remove accidental fold lines and lint. Refresh fabric appearance.
levels.MED: TEXTURE POP. Sharpen weave pattern. Deepen blacks. Define stitching.
levels.HIGH: TAILOR FIT. Re-drape fabric to remove bunching. Fix collar alignment. Visual ironing.
levels.FORCE: SARTORIAL PERFECTION. IMMACULATE TEXTILE DEFINITION. HIGH-THREAD COUNT VISIBILITY. PERFECT DRAPE.

sliders.ui_description: Aplica maquillaje correctivo o editorial realista.

levels.OFF: BARE FACE. No makeup. Visible capillaries and natural pallor.
levels.LOW: NATURAL ENHANCE. "No-makeup" look. Subtle lip tint. Mascara definition.
levels.MED: RED CARPET. Full foundation. Contouring. Defined brows. Lipstick.
levels.HIGH: EDITORIAL GLAM. High-fashion application. Strobing (Highlight). Graphic liner.
levels.FORCE: PROFESSIONAL MUA APPLICATION. CONTOUR & HIGHLIGHT SCULPTING. PHOTOGENIC DEFINITION. FLAWLESS APPLICATION.

sliders.ui_description: Organiza y limpia el fondo como un director de arte.

levels.OFF: JOURNALISTIC. Do not touch anything. Keep trash, cables, and clutter.
levels.LOW: TIDY UP. Remove obvious trash (papers, cups) from floor/tables.
levels.MED: SET DRESSING. Organize the mess. Align chairs/curtains. Balanced composition.
levels.HIGH: MINIMALIST. Remove non-essential furniture/objects. Clean surfaces.
levels.FORCE: EDITORIAL SET DESIGN. DISTRACTION REMOVAL. CLEAN COMPOSITION. CURATED PROPS. ARCHITECTURAL DIGEST STYLE.

sliders.ui_description: Reencuadra basándose en reglas áureas y cinematográficas.

levels.OFF: ORIGINAL FRAME. Do not crop. Respect user's framing errors.
levels.LOW: RULE OF THIRDS. Subtle crop to align eyes/horizon to grid.
levels.MED: CINEMATIC CROP. 2.35:1 Aspect Ratio. Cut headroom/bottom to focus on action.
levels.HIGH: TIGHT FRAMING. Aggressive crop to face/subject. Eliminate background.
levels.FORCE: GOLDEN RATIO COMPOSITION. PROFESSIONAL CROPPING. BALANCED NEGATIVE SPACE. CINEMATOGRAPHER EYE.

sliders.ui_description: Añade densidad atmosférica real para separar planos.

levels.OFF: VACUUM CLARITY. Zero haze. Transparent air. Maximum distance visibility.
levels.LOW: DEPTH HINT. Subtle aerial perspective (blueish distance). Separate planes.
levels.MED: SOFT DIFFUSION. "Pro-Mist" filter effect. Bloom on highlights. Airy feel.
levels.HIGH: VOLUMETRIC FOG. Visible density. Light shafts (God Rays). Moody.
levels.FORCE: ATMOSPHERIC DEPTH. SPATIAL SEPARATION. CINEMATIC HAZE. VOLUMETRIC DENSITY. REALISTIC FOG.

sliders.ui_description: Aplica corrección de color de cine (sin filtros baratos).

levels.OFF: REC.709 STD. Standard broadcast color. Neutral and accurate.
levels.LOW: WHITE BALANCE. Correct color casts (remove green/orange tints). Neutral greys.
levels.MED: ANALOG WARMTH. Subtle film simulation. Rich skin tones. Gold bias.
levels.HIGH: BLOCKBUSTER. Teal & Orange split toning. High color contrast.
levels.FORCE: MASTER COLOR GRADING. CINEMATIC COLOR HARMONY. PRECISE SKIN TONES. FILM PRINT EMULATION.

sliders.ui_description: Gestiona el brillo físico de materiales (PBR) realista.

levels.OFF: MATTE FINISH. Diffuse reflection. No specular highlights. Flat look.
levels.LOW: NATURAL SHINE. Standard gloss on plastic/metal. Accurate physics.
levels.MED: POLARIZED. Cut glare. Deepen color saturation on reflective surfaces.
levels.HIGH: WET LOOK. Enhance gloss map. Make surfaces look moist/polished.
levels.FORCE: PERFECT SPECULARITY. CONTROLLED REFLECTIONS. HIGH-GLOSS FINISH. SURFACE POLARIZATION.

sliders.ui_description: Simula iluminación de estudio de alta gama (Profoto/Arri).

levels.OFF: AMBIENT ONLY. Use available light. Flat or chaotic natural lighting.
levels.LOW: REFLECTOR FILL. Bounce light back to face. Reduce dark shadows under eyes.
levels.MED: SOFTBOX (OCTA). Commercial beauty light. Large source. Wrapping soft light.
levels.HIGH: FRESNEL (HARD). Hollywood spotlight. Defined shadows. High drama.
levels.FORCE: PROFOTO STUDIO STROBE. DIRECTIONAL MODIFIERS. SCULPTING LIGHT QUALITY. 3-POINT LIGHTING.

sliders.ui_description: Controla el contraste de iluminación (Ratio).

levels.OFF: NATURAL RATIO. Keep original contrast between light and dark side.
levels.LOW: NEGATIVE FILL. Block light (Black Flag) to deepen shadow side.
levels.MED: COMMERCIAL FILL. 2:1 Ratio. Shadow side is visible but darker.
levels.HIGH: HIGH KEY. 1:1 Ratio. Shadows are fully illuminated. Bright & Airy.
levels.FORCE: COMMERCIAL LIGHTING RATIO. OPEN SHADOWS. BROAD SOURCE FILL. SOFT WRAP. BEAUTY DISH.

sliders.ui_description: Luz trasera para separar sujeto del fondo.

levels.OFF: NO BACKLIGHT. Subject blends into background. 2D look.
levels.LOW: SUBTLE KICKER. Edge light on hair/shoulders to separate form.
levels.MED: HAIR LIGHT. Dedicated top/back light. Halo effect on hair.
levels.HIGH: SILHOUETTE. Strong backlight. Rim defines the shape.
levels.FORCE: DISTINCT EDGE SEPARATION. HAIR LIGHT / KICKER. SUBJECT ISOLATION. RIM LIGHTING.

sliders.ui_description: Simula efecto Tyndall natural.

levels.OFF: INVISIBLE AIR. Light travels invisibly. No scattering.
levels.LOW: SOFT BLOOM. Light sources glow slightly (Halation).
levels.MED: LIGHT SHAFTS. Visible God Rays coming from windows/sun.
levels.HIGH: DENSE PARTICLES. Dusty air catching light. Texture in the beams.
levels.FORCE: FOCUSED LIGHT BEAMS. ATMOSPHERIC SCATTERING. VISIBLE LIGHT PATH. TYNDALL EFFECT.

sliders.ui_description: Temperatura de color creativa (Kelvin).

levels.OFF: NEUTRAL. 5500K Daylight. White is White.
levels.LOW: WARM / COOL. Subtle shift (+/- 500K) for mood.
levels.MED: GOLDEN / BLUE. Golden Hour (3200K) or Blue Hour (7000K).
levels.HIGH: COLOR GELS. Creative lighting (Red/Blue lights).
levels.FORCE: PRECISE KELVIN ADJUSTMENT. MIXED LIGHTING BALANCE. CTO/CTB GEL SIMULATION.

sliders.ui_description: Curva de respuesta tonal fotográfica.

levels.OFF: LINEAR. Flat profile. Low contrast. Maximum data preservation.
levels.LOW: S-CURVE. Standard photography contrast. Correct blacks.
levels.MED: PUNCHY. Commercial pop. Vivid blacks and bright whites.
levels.HIGH: FILMIC. Deep shadows, soft highlight roll-off. Analog feel.
levels.FORCE: HIGH DYNAMIC CONTRAST. RICH TONALITY. DEEP BLACK POINT. PUNCHY HIGHLIGHTS.

sliders.ui_description: Control del punto negro y "cuerpo" de la sombra.

levels.OFF: STANDARD. Black point at 0. Details visible in darks.
levels.LOW: MATTE BLACK. Lifted blacks (faded vintage look).
levels.MED: DENSE BLACK. Add weight to shadows. Rich darkness.
levels.HIGH: CRUSHED. Zone 0 clipping. No detail in shadows. Noir style.
levels.FORCE: NEGATIVE FILL. HIGH DENSITY BLACKS. LOW KEY MOOD. LIGHT ABSORPTION.

sliders.ui_description: Estilos de Dirección de Fotografía reconocidos.

levels.OFF: SNAPSHOT. Random, uncurated lighting. Reality.
levels.LOW: COMMERCIAL. Clean, even, safe lighting. Stock photo look.
levels.MED: CINEMATIC. Moody, intentional shadows. Roger Deakins style.
levels.HIGH: CHIAROSCURO. Heavy contrast. Caravaggio painting style.
levels.FORCE: PAINTERLY LIGHTING. DRAMATIC FALL-OFF. MASTER CINEMATOGRAPHY AESTHETIC.

sliders.ui_description: Especularidad e hidratación de la piel.

levels.OFF: MATTE / POWDER. Dry skin. No shine. Flat finish.
levels.LOW: HEALTHY SHEEN. Natural oil hydration. Subtle highlights on nose/forehead.
levels.MED: DEWY. Moist, hydrated skin care look. Glow.
levels.HIGH: WET / SWEAT. Gym look. High gloss on skin.
levels.FORCE: DEWY COMPLEXION. CONTROLLED SPECULAR HIGHLIGHTS. HYDRATED SKIN SHEEN.
